metadata.title: CVE-2016-2474 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The Qualcomm Wi-Fi driver in Android before 2016-06-01 on Nexus 5X devicesallows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internalbug 27424603.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
